name: nativescript-onesignal
description: Nativescript plugin for OneSignal's Push Notifications SDK.

scripts.init: npm install && cd demo && npm install && tns install
scripts.rm: sudo rm -rf node_modules && sudo rm -rf demo/lib && sudo rm -rf demo/hooks && sudo rm -rf demo/node_modules && sudo rm -rf demo/platforms && sleep 1 && npm run rmjs
scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns emulate ios
scripts.demo.ios.device: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-onesignal && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.setup: npm i && cd demo && npm i && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
